original: nyā. pa. śa. 54 upamānamapi yadi gṛhyamāṇapadārthagatasādṛśyavijñānāt smaryamāṇapadārthagatasādṛśyavijñānam,

smaryamāṇa tvāt ca
vyavahāropyaḥ tu apūrvaḥ tad tad vyavahāra vat pratisambandha viśeṣa parāmarśa upādhikaḥ

sa tad gata sādṛśya pratiyogī
yathāmithas sva hastau

original: sādṛśyadhīrapi tathā kiṃ na syāt ? iti /

athavā yugapad eva tad sadṛśaḥ yam iti pratyayena eva ubhaya vṛtti sādṛśya sphuraṇāt na tad hetukam
anyathā pṛthak anubhūtayoḥ tadānīm apratīta sādṛśyayoḥ parastāt yugapad smaryamāṇayoḥ yugapad eva pratīyamāna sādṛyayoḥ kaḥ nirvāhaḥ
tatra api vā pramāṇa antaram kalpyate
yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ
go vat dvi śaphaḥ na bhavati aśvaḥ
iti tu sādharmya vaidharmya dharmya mātra viṣayam

yat tu śruta atideśa vākyasya gavaya ādau atideśa vākya artha pratyabhijñānam upamānam
tat ca vyutpatti phalakam iti
tat api anupapananam

samayaḥ durgrahaḥ pūrvam śabdena anumayā api vā
iti tatra nimittasya apratītitaḥ
iti tu asiddham

go sādṛśya ākāra upalakṣitasya prathamam eva vākya artha tayā pratītiḥ

original: gosādṛśyopalakṣitaḥ kaścid vyaktiviśeṣo gavaya iti hi pratītiḥ /

original: uktaṃ ca śrīviṣṇucitteḥ--- “gosadṛśo gavayaḥ iti gosādṛśyaikādhikaraṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ vācyamiti vyutpannam,
analyzed: uktam ca śrī viṣṇucitteḥ go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti go sādṛśya eka adhikaraṇam sāmānyam vācyam iti vyutpannam
prathamam vākya artha tayā pratīteḥ
go sādṛśya upalakṣitasya anirṇaye paścāt api anirṇayaḥ
anyathā nirṇaye tathā paścāt api
tatas vākya śravaṇa velāyām eva nirṇitam iti
evam ca anabhyupagame katham inrda ādi śabda vyutpattiḥ
na hi atra nimitta bhūta saṃsthāna viśeṣa ādi dṛṣṭiḥ
na ca nityam tatra avyutpattiḥ
tad artha viśiṣṭa vākya artha bodha āpātāt
evam nitya atīndriya viṣaya saṃskāra ādi śabdānām api nityam avyutpattiḥ eva syāt
tatra ced kathañcid nirvāhaḥ
tathā atra api
tat siddham na upamānam atiriktam iti
arthāpattiḥ tu anumānam eva

iti api na vācyam
pramāṇayoḥ satoḥ virodha abhāvāt

analyzed: nanu devadattasya jīvane kutaścid pramāṇāt pramite

original: na ca viruddhaviṣayayorvāstavaṃ kutrāpi samabalatvaṃ samasti;

ubhaya a prāmāṇye tu kathañcid syāt

original: agniṃ vinānupapadyamānatvasvaya liṅgapratyakṣarūpapramāṇadvayavirodhasya ca vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: agnim vinā anupapadyamāna tva svaya liṅga pratyakṣa rūpa pramāṇa dvaya virodhasya ca vaktum śakya tvāt

original: iti virodhe parvatārvāgbhāge vahniriti vyavasthākalpanasyārthāpattitvaṃ syāt /

uktam ca śrī viṣṇuttittaiḥ arthāpattiḥ anumānam ityādi

tasya prāk eva nirāsāt na pramāṇa varga anupraveśaḥ

original: nyā. pa. śa. 55 yattu āgamaprāmāṇye “anubhavaścendriyaliṅgaśabdasadṛśānyathānupapadyamānārthapūrvakaḥ” ityādiṣu upamānārthāpattiparigrahaḥ

tat api pūrvapakṣa pradeśa gata tvāt na siddhānta tvāya kalpate
abhāvaḥ tu asmad mate bhāva antarātmā
sa ca akṣa ādibhiḥ yathāsaṃbhavam sidhyati

original: abhāvātmanā tu grahaṇepi pratiyogismaraṇādisahakārisahitāni tānyeva pramāṇanīti na tadatiriktakalpanāvakāśaḥ /

atas eva hi prāk arta ja abhāva ādi vijñānam api nirvyūḍham

original: dṛṣṭa eva hi deśakālādisaṃsargādiviśeṣaḥ paścāt pratiyogismaraṇādimataḥ puruṣasya tadabhāvātmanā dhiyamadhirohati,

smartavyasya smaraṇa abhāvāt vā
tatra tad abhāva anumānam
evam atirikta abhāva pakṣe api nirmūlā pramāṇa antara kḷptiḥ

original: saghaṭaṃ bhūtalamitivat aghaṭaṃ bhūtalamityapi hyaparokṣā pratītiḥ;
analyzed: sa ghaṭam bhū talam iti vat aghaṭam bhū talam iti api hi aparokṣā pratītiḥ
na ca adhikaraṇa grahaṇa upakṣīṇam indriyam
guṇa ādiṣu api prasaṅgāt
atireka vat anatireke pi ajñāta karaṇa tva ādīni anumānāni ca sulabhāni iti

avirodha niścaya rūpa tve pi tad avirodha niścāyaka pramāṇa antare viśramaḥ
aitihyam tu pramāṇa mūlam ced āgamaḥ
tad ābhāsa mūlam ced tad ābhāsaḥ
evam ca iṣṭā lipi akṣara ādikam api abhiprāya varṇa viśeṣa ādya vinābhūtam anumānam eva
ceṣṭāyām varada nārāyaṇa bhaṭṭārakaiḥ evam uktam śabdasya vyavahārasya anukāraḥ ceṣṭayā api hi
kriyate śābda vijñāna yoginām sva artha bodhikā
anādi vyavahāreṣu ceṣṭāḥ vijñāta śaktikāḥ
bodhikāḥ syuḥ yathā adhyakṣam iti ced bhavataḥ matam

original: ceṣṭā giro vā svīkāryāḥ parapratyāyanāya hi /
analyzed: ceṣṭāḥ giraḥ vā svīkāryāḥ para pratyāyanāya hi
anādayaḥ girām eva anāditā jyāyasī tadā
ceṣṭā sāmayikī śābda vyavahāra anusāriṇī
asya evam bodhikā iti evam bharata ādi āgame sthitā
dṛśyate nādiḥ āmnāyaḥ usmaryamāṇa praṇetṛkaḥ
ityādi
tattvaratnākare tu evam uktam vyutpanna bodhya bodhaka niyamam ced ceṣṭitam śābdam

original: aniyatamapi sahadṛṣṭyā smārakamiti na pṛthageṣṭavyam iti /
analyzed: aniyatam api saha dṛṣṭyā smārakam iti na pṛthak eṣṭavyam iti

original: lipyakṣareṣu tu ayaṃ gakāraḥ ayaṃ ghakāraḥ iti varṇātmanā jñānamapramāṇameva /
analyzed: lipi akṣareṣu tu ayam gakāraḥ ayam ghakāraḥ iti varṇa ātmanā jñānam apramāṇam eva
etena cihnena idam akṣaram jānīhi iti abhiprāyeṇa lipi akṣara saṃbandha grāhakāṇām pravṛttiḥ
tatas ca vyāpti siddhiḥ
eṣā lipiḥ etad varṇa viśeṣa abhiprāya pūrvikā
bhrama ādi rahita varṇa abhiprāyavat puruṣa likhita etad lipi tvāt
saṃpratipanna vyutpatti kāla lipi vat
ityādi rūpaḥ prayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: yattu pratibhāyāmuktaṃ tattvaratnākare--- “nanu ca pratibhā kācid yathārthā mānamiṣyatām /
analyzed: yat tu pratibhāyām uktam tattvaratnākare nanu ca pratibhā kācid yathārthā mānam iṣyatām
bāhya artha nairapekṣyeṇa bāhya jñāna kṣamā astu sā
viśiṣṭa kāla puruṣa ādi apekṣā utkarṣa saṃbhavā
satyam kāla ādi bhedaḥ tu
san api asau vyavahṛtau na upayogī iti upekṣyate
pratibhāyāḥ phalam dṛṣṭam yadā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ
tat anyatas kṛtārtha tvāt prekṣyate na parīkṣakaiḥ
puṇyeṣu puruṣeṣu eṣā bhūyiṣṭham satya darśinī

original: tasmāt patañjaliḥ prāha pratibhā ceti tāṃ pramām” //
analyzed: tasmāt patañjaliḥ prāha pratibhā ca iti tām pramām
iti tat api prāc ukta yogi pratyakṣa viśeṣa viṣayam eva
nanu evam tat api pramāṇa tri tvam catuṣṭvam vā anupapannam
pratyakṣa parokṣa rūpeṇa dvi tvasya eva yukta tvāt
iti ced na
atiprasaṅgāt
tathā hi bahuṣu ekaikam uddhṛtya tad anyeṣu aikarāśyataḥ
dvaidha kṷptau ghada ādau api evam eva prasajyate
anumāna anumāna tva śabda aśabda vibhāgataḥ

original: pramāṇadvitvamevaṃ te vada kiṃ vāna rocate //
analyzed: pramāṇa dvi tvam evam te vada kim vāna rocate
pratyakṣasya tad anyābhyām vaijātya grahaṇāt yadi
tayoḥ api sva itarābhyām vaijātyam sphuṭam eva naḥ
atokṣa liṅga śabda ākhyā sādhāraṇa nidānataḥ
upalakṣyam pramātri tvam catuṣṭvam vā api saṃsmṛteḥ
spaṣṭam aspaṣṭam iti ca jaināḥ yat dvaidham ūcire
tad pratyakṣa parokṣa tva vibhāgāt na viśiṣyate

original: ato na tāvati dvaidhe sādhite vivadāmahe /
analyzed: atas na tāvati dvaidhe sādhite vivadāmahe
parokṣasya eka māna tvam durvacam bheda sādhanāt
nanu adhyakṣe api bhedaḥ usti bāhya antara vibhāgataḥ
divya adivya tayā cakṣuḥ śrotra ādi bhidayā api ca
tadvat parokṣasya ekasya pramāṇasya vibhāgataḥ
anumāna āgama bhidā katham nā abhyupagamyate
datta uttaram idam kiñcid dṛṣṭam etat śrutam tu idam
etat tu anumitam ca iti loka uktiḥ iha sākṣiṇī
yatas kutaścid vaidharmyam sādharmyam api kenacid
sarvatra sulabham kāmam iha api parigṛhyate
atas smṛti anubhūti ākhyā vibhāgāt api nā ucitam
pramāṇa dvi tvam iti evam prāk uktā eva su paddhatiḥ
trividhaḥ anubhavaḥ ca eva tad mūlā ca tathā smṛtiḥ

original: iti ṣoḍhā vibhāge tu na vimanyāmahe vayam //
analyzed: iti ṣoḍhā vibhāge tu na vimanyāmahe vayam
anubhūti vibhāgena tad mūlāyāḥ smṛteḥ api
vibhāgasya gatārtha tvāt aikarāśyam udāhṛtam
atas hi tasyāḥ tad mūleṣu antarbhāva vivakṣayā
pramāṇa vargam tri tvena prāñcaḥ kecid viviñcate
evam anyat api cintyam iti
nanu kim pramāṇa cintā kleśena

original: avimṛśyāpi pramāṇavargamupalambhānvayavyatirekādivaśāt paśvādīnāmiva manuṣyādīnāmapi laukikeṣvartheṣu pravṛttinivṛttitatprayojanādikaṃ nirupadravaṃ  #
analyzed: a vimṛśya api pramāṇa vargam upalambha anvaya vyatireka ādi vaśāt paśu ādīnām iva manuṣya ādīnām api laukikeṣu artheṣu pravṛtti nivṛtti tad prayojana ādikam nirupadravam
sidhyati

original: alaukikeṣvapi tattadvidhāyakaistadanugrāhakaiśca kalpasūtrādibhiścaritārthadhiyāṃ kimanena piṣṭapeṣaṇādikalpena vṛthā vimarśeneti cet,
analyzed: alaukikeṣu api tad tad vidhāyakaiḥ tad anugrāhakaiḥ ca kalpasūtra ādibhiḥ caritārtha dhiyām kim anena piṣṭa peṣaṇa ādi kalpena vṛthā vimarśena iti ced
mā evam avakāśa uparodhāya tattva upaplavam icchatām
a viparyāsa siddhyai ca viśodhyā māna yat hatiḥ
pratisaṃdhāya ca phanalam prārambha āhnika darśitam
sādhya prameya saṃśuddhyai sa aṅge māne pariśramaḥ
pratyakṣita samasta arthaiḥ yogi indraiḥ naraiḥ api laṅghyate
pramāṇa plavam ālambya tattva viplava sāgaraḥ
tasmāt ukta rītyā śuddhiḥ kartavyā iti

original: śuddhānyāyaniṣevitā śrutiśiraḥśuddhāntasiddhāntinī bhadrāṇāṃ pratipādanāya bhajatu pratyakṣatāmakṣatām /
analyzed: śuddhā nyāya niṣevitā śrutiśiraḥ śuddhānta siddhāntinī bhadrāṇām pratipādanāya bhajatu pratyakṣatām akṣatām

original: patyau nityarase samaṃ karuṇayā pātivratīṃ bibhratī sarvagranthivimocanī bhagavatī sā me samīcī kṛtiḥ //
analyzed: patyau nitya rase samam karuṇayā pātivratīm bibhratī sarva granthi vimocanī bhagavatī sā me samīcī kṛtiḥ

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau smṛtyadhyāye //
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāya pariśuddhau smṛti adhyāye
dvitīyam āhnikam
samāptaḥ ca caturthaḥ udhyāyaḥ
